rr.event
Class Event

java.lang.Object
  rr.event.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccessEvent, AcquireEvent, BarrierEvent, ClassInitializedEvent, InterruptEvent, JoinEvent, MethodEvent, NotifyEvent, ReleaseEvent, SleepEvent, StartEvent, WaitEvent
public class Event
extends Object
implements Cloneable

Common superclass of all events. An event represents some operation of the target program, such as accessing memory, acquiring a lock, or calling a method. To avoid allocation overhead, each type of event is created once for each target thread, and then re-used as that thread performs additional operation of that type. Thus, the thread field is final.

          The thread performing this event.
